title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a multi-channel agentic experience with Twilio and AWS (AIM236)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Twilio 和 AWS 构建多渠道智能体体验 (AIM236)
abstract: Poor customer experiences cost businesses $3.7 trillion annually, yet most contact centers use outdated systems. This session shows how to architect intelligent customer experience solutions combining Amazon Bedrock with Twilio's ConversationRelay platform. Learn to build real-time AI-powered conversation flows in messaging and email, create autonomous virtual agents for routine inquiries, and augment human agents with AI-powered recommendations. Walk away with reference architectures and implementation guidance to transform your contact center into a competitive advantage. Ideal for architects, developers, and technical leaders responsible for customer experience systems—no deep machine learning expertise required. This presentation is brought to you by Twilio, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 糟糕的客户体验每年给企业造成3.7万亿美元的损失,然而大多数联络中心仍在使用过时的系统。本次会议将展示如何将Amazon Bedrock与Twilio的ConversationRelay平台相结合,构建智能客户体验解决方案。学习在消息和电子邮件中构建实时AI驱动的对话流程,为常规查询创建自主虚拟代理,并通过AI驱动的建议增强人工座席能力。您将获得参考架构和实施指导,将联络中心转变为竞争优势。本课程适合负责客户体验系统的架构师、开发人员和技术领导者——无需深厚的机器学习专业知识。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Twilio提供。
